mapper.select: select rn, d_m_number, re_num, m_name, po_position, re_time, re_location_x,re_location_y, re_success from ( select rownum as rn, d_m_number, re_num, m_name, po_position, re_time, re_location_x,re_location_y, re_success from ( select dm.d_m_number, dm.re_num, m_name, po_position, re_time, re_location_x,re_location_y, re_success from member m, position p , request re , drone_mission dm where m.m_num = re.m_num AND p.po_num = m.po_num AND dm.re_num = re.re_num AND (re.re_success = 5 or re.re_success =6) order by re_time desc ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNo}) WHERE rn >= #{startRowNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM drone_mission dm , request re where re.re_num = dm.re_num AND (re.re_success = 5 Or re.re_success = 6)

SELECT dm.d_m_number, dm.d_number, dm.re_num, dm.m_num, dm.d_m_start, dm.d_m_preparation, m.m_num, m.m_name, m.m_id, m.m_pw, m.m_phone, m.po_num, p.po_position FROM drone_mission dm, member m, position p WHERE m.m_num = dm.m_num AND m.po_num = p.po_num AND d_m_number = #{d_m_number}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO drone_mission VALUES (DRONE_MISSION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 0, #{re_num}, 0, null, '["요청이 거절 되었습니다."]', SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE drone_mission SET d_m_start = '[요청이 거절 되었습니다.]', d_m_preparation = SYSDATE WHERE re_num = #{re_num}
